cards.title: Drink
cards.description: Do I really have to explain this?

cards.title: Give chugs
cards.description: Give three chugs to other players however you decide.

cards.title: Waterfall
cards.description: Every player starts drinking. The player from the left of the player gets to stop drinking first, and then from the left, etc.

cards.title: Rule
cards.description: You get to make new rule. Rules stay until to the end of the game unless someone uses new rule to delete old rule

cards.title: Bitch
cards.description: You get yourself a bitch. Everytime you drink, the person also drinks.

cards.title: Story
cards.description: Start a story with a chosen word. The next player repeats the word and adds a new one. Each player must repeat all previous words.

cards.title: Category
cards.description: Choose your desired category and say the first thing belonging to that category, for example, car brands, days of the week, or planets. Items are listed in turns until someone can't think of or repeats a previously mentioned item.
Take one sip. The next person takes two sips, and then the following person takes three sips, and so on.

cards.title: Truth or Dare
cards.description: Ask the victim 'truth or dare?' and act accordingly.

cards.title: Oldest Drinks
cards.description: The oldest player drinks.

cards.title: Youngest Drinks
cards.description: The youngest player drinks.

cards.title: Tallest Drinks
cards.description: The tallest player drinks.

cards.title: Shortest Drinks
cards.description: The shortest player drinks.

cards.title: Strongest Drink
cards.description: The player drinking the strongest beverage regrets their choice. In a tie, both/all drink.

cards.title: Weakest Drink
cards.description: Drink lightly. In a tie, both/all drink.

cards.title: List Last Names
cards.description: List the last names of each player. If you get all correct, others drink; otherwise, you drink.

cards.title: Do a Somersault and Drink
cards.description: Do a somersault and drink. Refusing the task means drinking more.

cards.title: Never Have I Ever...
cards.description: Go through a round where each person says something they have never done. Everyone who has done that thing drinks.

cards.title: Everyone Drinks
cards.description: That's what we came here to do.

cards.title: Speak in Song
cards.description: All your speech must be sung for a round. Other players decide if you succeed.

cards.title: Speak in Rhyme
cards.description: All your spoken sentences must rhyme for a round, for example, 'Is it my turn? Asks the tipsy churn'. Other players decide if you succeed.

cards.title: Last Message
cards.description: Read aloud the last message you received.

cards.title: Take a Selfie
cards.description: Take a selfie with another player. Important moments need to be captured!

cards.title: Take a Picture of Your Feet
cards.description: Take a picture and send it to your parents or partner. Participants in the game are not allowed.

cards.title: Secret Mission
cards.description: Create a gesture/action without telling others. Perform it randomly and others try to guess what you're doing. When others guess correctly, they start doing the action too. The last player to figure out the action drinks. Can start during other cards.

cards.title: Sympathy
cards.description: Drink three, others drink one.

cards.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors vs Everyone
cards.description: Play Rock-Paper-Scissors against every other player in turns. Drink for each lost game.

cards.title: Rock-Paper-Scissors vs Player
cards.description: Play rock-paper-scissors against one player. The loser drinks.

cards.title: 'Snap'
cards.description: Half of everyone's current drinks must be discarded.

cards.title: Speak Smurf Language
cards.description: Replace words in your speech with 'smurf' language for one round.

cards.title: Vote: Loudest Player
cards.description: Vote for the loudest player among you. The player with the most votes drinks.

cards.title: Vote: Heaviest Drinker
cards.description: Vote for the heaviest drinker among you. The player with the most votes drinks.

cards.title: Vote: Stingiest
cards.description: Vote for the stingiest player among you. The player with the most votes drinks.

cards.title: Vote: Smartest
cards.description: Vote for the smartest player among you. The player with the most votes drinks.

cards.title: Damn Rats
cards.description: All unemployed players drink.

cards.title: Baa Baa
cards.description: All employed players drink.

cards.title: Nicotine Addicts
cards.description: All currently under the influence of nicotine drink.

cards.title: Drinking Game Virgin
cards.description: All who are playing this game for the first time drink.

cards.title: Veterans
cards.description: All who have played this game before drink.

cards.title: Is This Worth It?
cards.description: Take a moment to ponder your life choices. Then drink.

cards.title: Jokester
cards.description: Tell a joke, all laughing players drink. If nobody laughs, you drink.

cards.title: Mr. DJ
cards.description: Start humming a song. The first player to correctly guess the song gets to decide who drinks.

cards.title: Outcast
cards.description: All players must ignore you for one round.

cards.title: Pervert
cards.description: Slap another player's butt.

cards.title: Twenty-One
cards.description: Start counting numbers. Each player says one, two, or three consecutive numbers. The player who lands on 21 drinks. For example: one... two, three... four.

cards.title: Opposition
cards.description: Come up with two different options. Each player chooses one option. The minority drinks. For example: Pizza or hamburger.

cards.title: Cheers!
cards.description: Cheers your drinks and drink up.

cards.title: Macho
cards.description: Flex your biceps and drink.

cards.title: Earthling
cards.description: Sit on the floor for one round.

cards.title: General Knowledge
cards.description: Ask the victim a general knowledge question. If they answer incorrectly, they drink; otherwise, you drink.

cards.title: Damn Eyes
cards.description: Decide who among the players has the nicest eyes. They drink.

cards.title: Do You Know Me???
cards.description: Make a statement about yourself. Other players individually decide if the statement is true or false. Those who guess wrong drink.

cards.title: Phone Addict
cards.description: The player who last checked their phone drinks. The rule reader is excluded.

cards.title: Furry Creature
cards.description: The hairiest player drinks.

cards.title: Floor is Lava
cards.description: No one is allowed to touch the floor for one round. If you do, drink.

cards.title: Bully
cards.description: Insult another player.

cards.title: Popular
cards.description: All players must compliment you or drink.

cards.title: Drank before 6 PM
cards.description: Everyone who has consumed alcohol before 6 PM today drinks.

cards.title: Yes or No
cards.description: Ask a question that can be answered only with 'yes' or 'no'. If the player answers with something else, they drink.

cards.title: Name a Music Genre
cards.description: Choose a music genre, and each player takes turns singing or shouting one song from that genre. If someone can't think of a song, they drink.

cards.title: Impersonation
cards.description: Imitate a famous person or character for one minute. Other players guess who you are impersonating. If no one guesses correctly, the impersonator drinks.

cards.title: Forbidden Word
cards.description: Select a word that the target player cannot say throughout the round. If they say the word, they drink.

cards.title: Emoji Message
cards.description: Send a short message to the target player using only emojis. The recipient tries to pronounce the message in words. If they misunderstand the message, they drink.

cards.title: Wrong Answer
cards.description: Come up with a question for the target player that can be answered with yes/no or a specific number, and indicate the type of answer. The target must answer without knowing the question beforehand, and if they answer incorrectly, they drink.

cards.title: Famous Quote
cards.description: The target must recite a famous line from a person or character. Other players try to guess who or what the character is. Incorrect guessers drink. If everyone guesses correctly, only the target drinks.

cards.title: Dice Game
cards.description: The player must roll a die and get a specific number predetermined by them. If they fail, they drink. If they succeed, everyone else drinks.

cards.title: Entertainment Riddle
cards.description: The player describes the plot of their chosen movie, series, or game without mentioning its name. The first player to guess correctly decides who or who drinks.

cards.title: Payday
cards.description: The player who most recently received their paycheck, social benefits from the government, or gift money drinks.

cards.title: isEven(bday)
cards.description: Players born on an even-numbered day drink.

cards.title: isOdd(bday)
cards.description: Players born on an odd-numbered day drink.
